mods.abstract: Slim Rhodes And His Mountaineers (styled as Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers) radio show for WMC-AM, Memphis, Tennessee, sponsored by Mother's Best flour. Originally broadcast 1948-05-13 at 11:30 am (CST) as part of the daily Slim Rhodes And His Mother's Best Mountaineers radio show. Mentioned band members include Slim Rhodes, Speck Rhodes, Dusty Rhodes, Ruth, Tommy and Herbie. WMC-AM announcer Russ Hodge.
